skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...

security_audit.summary: This is an official skill with static theme data and instructions. No executable code or external access is present. No security concerns found.

content.user_title: Apply a professional theme to your artifact
content.value_statement: You need consistent visual styling across artifacts. This skill provides ready themes and clear steps to apply them.
actual_capabilities: Lists 10 preset themes with names and uses
Provides color palettes with hex codes for each theme
Specifies header and body fonts per theme
Directs users to view theme-showcase.pdf before selection
Generates a custom theme description on request
limitations: Does not edit files automatically without a host tool
Theme showcase is a static PDF and needs manual viewing
Font availability depends on the user environment
Themes are limited to the provided palettes and fonts

use_cases.title: Brand consistent decks
use_cases.description: Select a theme and apply matching colors and fonts across pitch decks.

use_cases.title: Quick visual direction
use_cases.description: Compare theme options and choose a palette that fits a new landing page.

use_cases.title: Polished client reports
use_cases.description: Apply a professional theme to reports for consistent client delivery.

prompt_templates.title: Show available themes
prompt_templates.scenario: You want to see theme options
prompt_templates.prompt: Show the theme showcase and list the available themes with brief descriptions.

prompt_templates.title: Apply Ocean Depths
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the Ocean Depths theme to my slide deck with its specified colors and fonts.

prompt_templates.title: Compare two themes
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare Golden Hour and Modern Minimalist for a finance report and recommend one.

prompt_templates.title: Create a custom theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a custom theme for a wellness brand with calm colors and readable fonts, then show it for review.

output_examples.input: Apply the Forest Canopy theme to my report.
output: Typography: Headers FreeSerif Bold, Body FreeSans

best_practices: Ask the user to view the theme showcase before selection
Confirm the selected theme name before applying it
Check contrast and readability after applying colors
anti_patterns: Applying a theme without user confirmation
Changing the theme palette outside the defined colors

faq.question: Is this compatible with any document type?
faq.answer: It provides colors and fonts that can be applied to slides, docs, and reports in most tools.

faq.question: What are the limits of the presets?
faq.answer: There are 10 preset themes. Custom themes are descriptive and follow the same format.

faq.question: How does it integrate with my tools?
faq.answer: It outputs palettes and fonts. Your editor or workflow must apply them.

faq.question: Does it store or send my data?
faq.answer: No. The skill is local and contains only theme definitions.

faq.question: What if the fonts are missing?
faq.answer: Install the listed fonts or substitute close alternatives with similar weight and style.

faq.question: How does it compare to generic theming?
faq.answer: It provides curated palettes and font pairings with intended use guidance.
